data.event: Originally part of Frankfort, it was settled in 1759 when Fort Pownall was completed at Fort Point on Cape Jellison.
Prospect was set off and incorporated in 1794.
Stockton (later Stockton Springs) was set off and incorporated in 1857.
Construction on Fort Knox began in 1844, using granite from Mount Waldo in Frankfort.
Although never fully completed, work on the huge defense stopped in 1869.
